name: Puzzle Guys
description:
Puzzle Guys is a puzzle adventure about 4 heroes who have to rescue a princess.

Terrible news came from the capital of Sunland - the royal princess Lina was kidnapped by an evil dragon. He took her to his nest, which is located on the Mount of Death. That is where our four heroes have to go, in order to take Lina from the clutches of an evil dragon. Will they succeed? Will they be able to defeat a huge dragon? Sure! They're the main characters, what are you talking about...
